meanings.definition: The process of setting type by means of a photographic process.
meanings.sent1: Phototypesetting involves using photography to set type.
meanings.sent2: The printing shop upgraded to phototypesetting for faster production.
meanings.sent3: I tried phototypesetting my homework, but the letters came out blurry!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a phototypesetting machine, capturing every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The magic of phototypesetting brought words to life on the page.

meanings.definition: The equipment or process of setting type by means of a photographic process.
meanings.sent1: The phototypesetting machine was a marvel of modern technology.
meanings.sent3: The phototypesetting equipment hummed quietly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: His brain worked like a phototypesetting device, arranging thoughts with clarity.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of phototypesetting lay in its precision and efficiency.
